ioBroker instance id of your Frigate ada: ioBroker instance id of your Frigate adapter (e.g. frigate.0).
Base URL for Frigate HTTP API (e.g. http: Base URL for Frigate HTTP API (e.g. http://192.168.1.10:5000). Leave empty if you only use adapter states (no media downloads).
Name: Name
Label: Label
Fallback target for cameras without spec: Fallback target for cameras without specific target. Set camera-specific targets above in "Cameras" table.
Please configure cameras in Global tab f: Please configure cameras in Global tab first
URL must start with http:// or https://: URL must start with http:// or https://
Select an item on the left or add a new: Select an item on the left or add a new one.
Notify: Send messages to Discord/Telegra: Notify: Send messages to Discord/Telegram. Device: Control a switch/device based on detections.
Leave empty to apply to all cameras, or: Leave empty to apply to all cameras, or select specific cameras.
Optional: Override notification target p: Optional: Override notification target per camera
Comma-separated. Common: new, update, en: Comma-separated. Common: new, update, end. Typical: end
Object type to detect (person, car, dog,: Object type to detect (person, car, dog, cat, etc.)
Minimum confidence score (0.0-1.0). High: Minimum confidence score (0.0-1.0). Higher = fewer false positives.
Minimum time between actions. Prevents s: Minimum time between actions. Prevents spamming.
Time window for duplicate detection. Lon: Time window for duplicate detection. Longer = fewer duplicates.
Send snapshot if clip download fails.
Adds seconds before/after event. Typical: Adds seconds before/after event. Typical: 0-3. Increase if clips start too late or end too early.
Maximum file size for uploads. Discord:: Maximum file size for uploads. Discord: max 8-25 MB depending on server boost.
Wait time before first clip download att: Wait time before first clip download attempt. Gives Frigate time to create the clip.
Number of retry attempts if clip downloa: Number of retry attempts if clip download fails.
Controls a device (lamp, switch) based o: Controls a device (lamp, switch) based on person detection in zones. Similar to scripted automation but automated via adapter.
ioBroker state to control, e.g., hue.0.L: ioBroker state to control, e.g., hue.0.Lamp.on - will be set to true when person detected in zones during time window.
Time to wait before turning device off a: Time to wait before turning device off after last detection.
Interval to verify device state. Ensures: Interval to verify device state. Ensures correct state if manual changes occur.
Add Frigate zone person counters (e.g.,: Add Frigate zone person counters (e.g., frigate.0.Zone_Haustuer.person). Device triggers when ANY zone detects a person.
Add one or more Frigate zones. Device ac: Add one or more Frigate zones. Device activates when person detected in ANY zone.
Control when device can be triggered. E.g., only at night or during specific hours.
State containing start time in HH:MM:SS: State containing start time in HH:MM:SS format (e.g., astro.0.sunrise)
State containing end time in HH:MM:SS fo: State containing end time in HH:MM:SS format (e.g., astro.0.sunset)
Define cameras with zones. Zones can be: Define cameras with zones. Zones can be selected via state picker from Frigate adapter.
Select a camera or add a new one.
Configure Discord webhooks or Telegram b: Configure Discord webhooks or Telegram bots for notifications.
Select a target or add a new one.
